subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription:
Feast your eyes on the amazing! Prepare to be fascinated by opening your eyes to world with a different perspective.Here are some of the cool things you get to see in Meta Magic:
  • Cornstarch - Non Newtonian Fluid Pool - The 70% Jesus Experiment - walk on 70% water
  • Mercury Heartbeat - an odd phenomenon which makes Mercury go 'Dhak Dhak'
  • Dry Ice Events - Bottle Opening, Dry Ice Bubbles, Insta-Cooled Sodas, etc - Pretty Cool stuff
  • Liquid Nitrogen Events - Instant Ice Cream, Brittle Bananas, Ductile-Brittle Transitions, etc - Waaaay Cooler stuff
  • Superconductors :The Meissner Effect - Magnetic Levitation - Just like a particularly funny helmet-wearing supervillian
  • Ferrofluids - Liquid that responds to Magnetic Fields - Said supervillian's starting to like us for making this stuff
  • Graphene - 'Nuff said - I mean, If you don't know what this is, you haveto come see it
  • Elephant Toothpaste - Cant be too good for the teeth, in my honest opinion, though.
  • Hydrophobic Sand - It's sand, and doesn't like water
  • Rod Climbing Polymers - A Non Newtonian Fluid which climbs up a rod against gravity - A slightly creepy Slime is involved
  • Instant Polymerisation (Liq-Solid Transition) : Interfacial Polycondensation - We call this the Cotton Candy Experiment
  • Metallic Foam and Aerogel : Lightest materials known to man - over 97% air
  • Flame Hardening : Live treatment to increase Strength and Hardness - Flamethrowers and what not
  • Demonstration of the effects of Heat Treatment - Some good ol' fashioned core Metallurgy
